title: Turkcell shareholders start first AGM since 2010

content: DUBAI  March 26 Here are some factors that may affect Middle East stock markets on Thursday. Reuters has not verified the press reports and does not vouch of their accuracy.
name: Turkcell Iletisim Hizmetleri AS
title: MIDEAST STOCKS - Factors to watch - March 26

content: ISTANBUL  March 25 A plan to push for a $1.5 billion dividend from Turkish mobile operator Turkcell  will not resolve deadlock among investors  shareholder Alfa Group said on Wednesday  adding its offer to buy shares in the company could resolve the problems.
name: Turkcell Iletisim Hizmetleri AS
title: Turkcell shareholder says dividend proposal does not resolve deadlock

content: Oslo  March 25 The following stocks may be affected by newspaper reports and other factors on day:
name: Turkcell Iletisim Hizmetleri AS
title: NORDIC STOCKS - Factors to watch on March 25

content: STOCKHOLM  March 25 TeliaSonera and the other shareholders in Turkcell Holding have agreed to propose a dividend for the first time in five years for Turkey's Turkcell  TeliaSonera said on Wednesday.
name: Turkcell Iletisim Hizmetleri AS
title: TeliaSonera  other Turkcell Holding owners propose Turkcell dividend

content: * TeliaSonera and the other shareholders in Turkcell Holding have agreed on a dividend distribution proposal to the general assembly meeting of Turkcell
name: Turkcell Iletisim Hizmetleri AS
title: BRIEF-TeliaSonera  other owners propose 3.9 bln TRY Turkcell dividend

content: ISTANBUL Russia's Alfa Telecom offered $2.8 billion on Tuesday to buy back a 13.8 percent stake in Turkcell   a move that would give billionaire Mikhail Fridman's group control of Turkey's top mobile operator.
name: Turkcell Iletisim Hizmetleri AS
title: Russia's Alfa Telecom bids $2.8 billion to double stake in Turkcell

content: * Alfa might be seeking to force buyout of its own stake   (Recasts  adds analyst comments  changes slug for media clients)
name: Turkcell Iletisim Hizmetleri AS
title: UPDATE 2-Russia's Alfa Telecom bids $2.8 bln to double stake in Turkcell

content: ISTANBUL  March 17 Russia's Alfa Telecom said on Tuesday it offered a total of $2.8 billion to buy a 13.76 percent stake in Turkey's biggest mobile operator Turkcell.
name: Turkcell Iletisim Hizmetleri AS
title: Russia's Alfa Telecom bids $2.8 bln for 13.76 pct stake in Turkcell

content: ISTANBUL  Feb 24 Businesses run by Turkish mobile operator Turkcell and Russia's VimpelCom  and MTS have been awarded 3G mobile licences in Ukraine  the companies said on Tuesday.
name: Turkcell Iletisim Hizmetleri AS
title: CORRECTED-UPDATE 2-Turkcell  VimpelCom  MTS units win 3G mobile licences in Ukraine

content: ISTANBUL  Feb 24 Astelit  a subsidiary of Turkish mobile operator Turkcell  won a tender for a 3G UMTS mobile licence in Ukraine with a 3.35 billion Ukraine hryvnia ($118.4 million) bid  Turkcell said in a statement to the Istanbul stock exchange.
name: Turkcell Iletisim Hizmetleri AS
title: Turkcell unit wins 3G mobile licence in Ukraine
